---
description: these are instructions to follow for all projects
# applyTo: load this when you are working on any file and projects etc. 
---
When using ports, make sure you use a 5 number port that is random and not used. This stops port conflicts.

Always check container logs in docker. Both local and in the VPS to ensure the containers are working as they should. 

Always use a browser to check your work if building a website. 

Always test your work when you make or add a new feature. 

be sure to linter ever update
if you find lint errors.. you need to always fix them and verify the fix
 always check in the browser after each update
